Class Network

java.lang.Object
task1.Network
All Implemented Interfaces:
NetworkElement
public class Network extends Object implements NetworkElement
Composite representing a network or sub-network. A Network contains other NetworkElement instances (Servers, Workstations, Cables, or nested Networks). It implements accept() to allow Visitor traversal.

    • accept

      public void accept(Visitor visitor)
      Accept a Visitor. The visitor will be applied to this network and then recursively to all child elements.
